TestInformation.Title: High Performance Conjugate Gradient
TestInformation.Description: HPCG is the High Performance Conjugate Gradient and is a new scientific benchmark from Sandia National Lans focused for super-computer testing with modern real-world workloads compared to HPCC.
TestInformation.PreInstallMessage: Supported install-time optional variables include $MPI_PATH, $MPI_INCLUDE, $MPI_CC, $MPI_LIBS, $CFLAGS, $LD_FLAGS, and $MPI_LD
TestInformation.PostInstallMessage: Supported run-time optional environment variables include $MPI_NUM_THREADS, $HOSTFILE
